item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (167 points | 79 comments)
2. Why pipes sometimes get "stuck": buffering (275 points | 67 comments)
3. Llama.cpp guide – Running LLMs locally on any hardware, from scratch (253 points | 51 comments)
4. Brick and Mortar Triangle Fraud (22 points | 8 comments)
5. What does this button do? – My new car has a mysterious and undocumented switch (237 points | 160 comments)
6. The Influence of Bell Labs (78 points | 29 comments)
7. The Hall SC-VGA-2 Video Processor, the Atari ST and NeXTSTEP (15 points | 2 comments)
8. Jank is now running on LLVM IR (55 points | 13 comments)
9. Calmy Leon – The Ultimate Relaxing Music and Sound Generator (36 points | 5 comments)
10. Rust: Tools (early access edition) (28 points | 16 comments)
11. TfL abandons plans for driverless tube trains (10 points | 8 comments)
12. The Deterioration of Google (53 points | 19 comments)
13. Understanding SIMD: Infinite complexity of trivial problems (119 points | 53 comments)
14. Borgo Programming Language (291 points | 123 comments)
15. NASA's Europa Clipper: Miles Down, Instruments Deploying (10 points | discuss)
16. Simple Sabotage for the 21st Century – Specific Suggestions (88 points | 47 comments)
17. Prioritize work at the task level (104 points | 25 comments)
18. Ask HN: Platform for senior devs to learn other programming languages? (39 points | 18 comments)
19. Chinese pebble-bed nuclear reactor passes "meltdown" test (107 points | 40 comments)
20. Sieve (YC W22) Is Hiring Engineers to Build the Future of Video AI ( | hide)
21. A statistical approach to model evaluations (39 points | 7 comments)
22. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (183 points | 176 comments)
23. Summary of "Improvising cellular playgrounds in Realtalk", Aug 2023 [video] (23 points | 2 comments)
24. Scratching the Surface: How geology shaped American culture (25 points | 16 comments)
25. How We Got the Lithium-Ion Battery (51 points | 12 comments)
26. CleaR: Robust and Generalized Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning for Noisy Labels (12 points | discuss)
27. Show HN: Vince – A self hosted alternative to Google Analytics (224 points | 66 comments)
28. German WWII Soldier Grave Found with Mesolithic Tools, Roman and Byzantine Coins (72 points | 64 comments)
29. Show HN: Screen Sharing in the Browser (189 points | 40 comments)
30. Perhaps acquiring Pixelmator is about competing with Creative Cloud (66 points | 48 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
